hero.title: Frontend Developer
hero.subtitle: With Full Stack development experience
hero.description: I have over one year of experience building web applications using Angular, TypeScript and TailwindCSS. I’ve worked on Full Stack projects with Node.js, Express and MongoDB, and I also have knowledge of Java, Springboot and PostgreSQL.

items.description: Development of a web system for managing a company's vehicle fleet, focused on maintenance control, issue reporting, and workshop assignment.
details:
• Implementation of a publication-based system to report vehicle failures or maintenance needs.
• Registered workshops could comment and provide quotes directly from their profiles.
• The system allowed comparison of costs, delivery times, and availability to support operational decisions.
• Workshop assignment based on priority, budget, and maintenance urgency.

items.description: Development of a backend system for managing branches, employees, menus, and orders in a food franchise.
items.details: • Implementation of a complete backend using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.</br>• Employee management including roles, salaries, and personal information.</br>• Administration of menus, products, ingredients, combos, and pricing.</br>• Order module with automatic calculation of subtotal, taxes, and total.</br>• Secure authentication using JWT and password encryption.</br>• Generation of daily PDF reports for sales closing.</br>

items.project: E-commerce for Electric Bikes Focused on UX/UI Design
items.description: Development of an online store focused on user experience, visual design, and responsive layout.
items.details: • Creation of an online store using WordPress and Elementor.</br>• Full UI customization including colors, typography, and visual components.</br>• Responsive optimization for mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.</br>• Improved navigation and product presentation.</br>• Visual adjustments using custom CSS for a more professional look.</br>

items.description: Online store for fitness equipment with a focus on accessibility, clean design, and user experience.
items.details: • Development of a full e-commerce website using WordPress.</br>• Design focused on accessibility and visual clarity.</br>• Customization of buttons, typography, and color palette.</br>• Fully responsive layout across all devices.</br>• Use of custom CSS to improve visual consistency and usability.</br>

items.project: Thesis Tracking System – Instituto Tecnológico de Cuautla
items.description: Academic management system for tracking and controlling graduate thesis progress.
items.details: • Development of a complete thesis management system for graduate students.</br>• Administration of academic periods, professors, and students.</br>• Task assignment and thesis progress tracking.</br>• Role-based modules for coordinator, professors, and students.</br>• Bulk user import using CSV files.</br>• Administrative validation and control of thesis status.</br>
